attributes.action: MPs should respect EU exit decision or resign and leave parliament.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to ask all MPs who can not accept the people's majority decision to exit EU to resign and leave the parliament immediately. We need MPs who understand our democratic principles and respect the nation's democratic values and the civil and political rights of the people. The decision to leave was a free and fair decision from a referendum and it was a clear exercise of the democratic value and rights in the UK.
attributes.background: We call on all MPs who can not respect the majority decision to exit EU, in a free and fair  referendum to resign and leave the parliament immediately. We need MPs who understand and respect the nation's democratic values and the civil and political rights of the people.

rejection.details: A decision to resign would be for an individual to take, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
